|  [createGroup(formData)](./sfapi.accountservice.creategroup.md) |  | <p>Create Group Create a filegroup.</p><p>- \*\*name\*\*: the group's name (max 8 characters, no unicode) - \*\*repo\_name\*\*: the name of the project the group should belong to</p> |

|  [getUser(username)](./sfapi.accountservice.getuser.md) |  | Read User Get the a user's account information. (If none give, defaults to the authenticated user.) |
